text: Source Code for Biology and Medicine is a peer-reviewed open-access scientific journal in the field of bioinformatics, including information systems and data mining. The journal is published by BioMed Central and was established in 2006. The editors-in-chief are Emmanuel Ifeachor (University of Plymouth) and Leif E. Peterson (The Methodist Hospital Research Institute). == Abstracting and indexing == The journal is abstracted and indexed in Chemical Abstracts Service, EmBiology, and Scopus. == References == == External links == * Category:Publications established in 2006 Category:English-language journals Category:BioMed Central academic journals Category:Monthly journals Category:Biomedical informatics journals
title: Source Code for Biology and Medicine
